With her mom, Trinity, raising her in Portugal, Jodean didn’t meet the Phoenix family right away–but when she did, thanks to her half-brother River Phoenix, I was pleased to find that things turned out quite good for her.

River, along with the rest of her half-siblings, really welcomed her into the fold. This made Jodean part of a close-knit crew, which also included her dad, John Lee Bottom. It’s really surprising when you think about how her journey rather weaved her into the fabric of the Phoenix family.

Growing up, Jodean was extremely close with her brothers and sisters; they had this strong connection full of love and support. Because of how she was raised, Jodean decided to keep to herself, unlike her famous relatives who are always in the public eye; the reader will find out that her childhood played a major part in her choice to keep things private.
